name: Crystal
summary: Earn crystal when mining anywhere in Minado.
description: Crystal can be forged to create various Minado Gemstones. GEMs can be traded on ANY marketplace -OR- for exclusive rewards & services ONLY found in Minado.
legal: Crystal is the ONLY mineral that can forge Minado Gemstones.
